entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rebuild of native parts of coreclr and libraries doesn't work with cross build #65533
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking fixed-length markers never triggered #65532
    7.0.0
  • Allow creation of a root Activity when Activity.Current is not null #65528
    Future
  • NullableConverter does not flow serialization state #65522
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuilder.Insert(int, StringBuilder) #65519
  • SslCertificateTrust is not sent on Windows #65515
    7.0.0
  • LoadGdipImageFromStream when BuiltInComInteropSupport=false #65510
  • Unable to work with PerformanceCounters when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65502
    6.0.4
  • Should the DllImportGenerator be packable or not? #65495
    7.0.0
  • JsonObject does not respect JsonSerializerOptions e.g. PropertyNamingPolicy = JsonNamingPolicy.CamelCase #65493
  • Make it possible to build just the shared framework projects or the out-of-band projects #65492
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #65513
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #65512
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #65511
  • [wasm] running tests on NodeJs fails with `globalThis is not defined` #65485
  • [mono] AOT compiler fails when assembly files are named in other cultures #65484
    6.0.x
  • Composite images add their code ranges to the code manager too often #65481
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65476
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector256\\Fma_ro\\Fma_ro.cmd #65474

Closed

  • Make it possible to build only the inbox portion of libs #51168
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'fgClassInstrumentor->SchemaCount() == info.compClassProbeCount' #65499
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for float/double array access #64819
    7.0.0
  • codegenarmarch.cpp:3201 Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & killMask) == 0' #65395
    7.0.0
  • On modern runtimes, HttpClient.GetAsync is really slow to localhost, really fast to 127.0.0.1 #65375
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBuffer failing on OSX #64963
  • API proposal: Nullable.RefValue, RefValueOrDefault #1534
    7.0.0
  • Http proxy not working with authentication #64459
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun images crash if compiled for AVX2 but run on non-AVX2 CPU #61471
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializerContext.GetTypeInfo depends on hidden value #65306
  • HttpClient: Header allocations #31235
    7.0.0
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65441
    7.0.0
  • Expand the maximum argument count of (Value)Tuple.Create() #29603
    Future
  • PowerShell running as SSH subsystem child SIGABRTs in a linux container #65232
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest Failures #65065
  • Loading of XML files fails when using prefix for long paths #59122
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) doesn't kill entire process tree on dotnet Debian images #45017
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Handle exceptions while evaluating expressions #61665
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.NamedPipeFileStreamConnectedConformanceTests.ReadWrite_Success_Large #65475
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on delegate construction #65010
  • Normalize `Vector64/Vector128.Create(0)/Create(0,0, ..)` to `Vector64/Vector128.Zero` #63490
  • [QUIC] Use server TLS options in QUIC #32071
    7.0.0
  • [mini] gshared static virtual methods: asserts !sig->has_type_parameters #65394
    7.0.0
  • Escape analysis inconsistency #65463

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump next from 11.1.3 to 12.1.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-nextjs #65534
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Skip RegexOptions.NonBacktracking phase 3 for some patterns #65531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Allow Trace Samplers to Modify the Activity Trace State #65530
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Add line break to please Firefox #65529
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create snapcraft.yaml for 7.0 #65525
    area-Snap
  • Support resumable serialization in NullableConverter<T> #65524
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Disable wasm aot tests hitting OOM on all platforms #65521
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #52615 Enable tests crashing on CI #65518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Rollback emscripten to 2.0.23 #65517
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][wasm] Implicit NodeJS version on Helix #65514
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix stacktrace from DIM #65509
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Clean-up slngen related logic #65507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve PipeWriterTests.CompleteWithLargeWriteThrows #65506
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [wasm] Replace active issue for browser platform with NodeJS only #65505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    area-System.Net
  • Fix XNodeReaderFunctionalTests #65500
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm][ignore] check main with emscripten 2.0.23 #65496
    * NO MERGE *, area-Build-mono
  • [No review] NativeAOT CoreCLR testing #65491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use CopyContext to restore saved context on X86 #65490
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Checking CI build for segmenting diagnostics eventpipe tests for Android #65489
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #65483
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Add dependencies on EMSDK manifest bands for coherency in installer #65478
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Move architecture-specific code out of codegencommon.cpp #65488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update main branding to preview 3 #65346
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65414
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • PGO: Profile isinst/castclass #65460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace picture of API review process with diagram #65527
    area-Meta
  • Update tests to help uncover CrossGen2 scenario validation #65477
    area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: better addressing mode for floating point on arm64 #65468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retries to SPMI download #65516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clear GC info when consuming GT_PUTARG_SPLIT nodes #65432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ping tests on OSX #65508
    area-System.Net
  • Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65482
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Use `push` for 8/12 byte struct args on x86 #65387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix verification of open delegates #65425
    area-ILVerification
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65442
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • Add xargs for dotnet format command #65090
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move MacCatalyst arm64 leg definitions from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65427
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add @teo-tsirpanis to community triagers #65503
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65435
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove dead code in illink.targets #65494
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Avoid additional AssemblyInfo output file #65465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add reminder for package authoring #65480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Fix OP_FMAX an OP_FMIN on amd64 and lift the overly restricted architecture limitation #65445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove or move some expensive low-value testing #65453
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Compute the type of generic context used by static virtua… #65459
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Disable component governance for musl runs #65454
  • [wasm] Disable aot tests failing due to OOM #65413
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forward DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute to the inner P/Invoke. #65458
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65447
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • FIX | Adds support for Shim gss api on Linux to delay loading libgssapi_krb… #65469
    area-System.Net
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4 #65003
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix crashes when methods fail LLVM compilation. #65391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Added OnesComplement, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add linux-x64 coop gc test run to runtime-staging #64468
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add FlagsAttribute to GC_ALLOC_FLAGS #65461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cache aotdata file in AOTCompiler task #65472
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [No Review] Trying Server 2022 in main pipeline #65236
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.1.22108.2 #65006
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Generate 300 band Mono.Toolchain manifest #65308
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
